title: The police must atone for their wrongs and Watson is not fit to continue as an MP
text:
When the heavily redacted summary of Sir Richard Henriques’s report into Operation Midland was released in November 2016 it was impossible to avoid the suspicion that the Metropolitan Police were attempting to cover up their wrongdoing.

It is clear from the fuller, albeit still partially redacted, document that was finally released on Friday that my suspicions were correct. This time, I doubt the police will get away with it.

Operation Midland was the ill-fated investigation into historical child sexual and physical abuse, torture and serial child murder based on the criminally false and heinous allegations made by a man known by his pseudonym of “Nick”. Carl Beech, Nick’s real name, was sentenced...
